CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Loma Negra Compania Industrial Argentina Sociedad Anonima

Address.label: Address
Address.value: BOULEVARD CECILIA GRIERSON 355, PISO 4,4TH FLOOR, BUENOS AIRES, C1107CPG, Argentina

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Loma Negra Cia Industria Argentina SA is a cement producer in Argentina. The company operates in five segments: Cement, masonry cement, and lime; Concrete; Rail services; Aggregates; and Others. The majority of its revenue comes from Cement, masonry cement, and lime segment.
